010package imagingbook.common.regions.utils;
011
012import java.awt.BasicStroke;
013import java.awt.Color;
014import java.awt.Shape;
015import java.util.List;
016
017import ij.gui.Overlay;
018import ij.gui.Roi;
019import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
020import imagingbook.common.regions.Contour;
021import imagingbook.common.regions.ContourTracer;
022
023/**
024 * A special overlay for showing binary region contours.
025 * TODO: convert to CustomOverlay
026 * 
027 * @version 2020/04/01
028 */
029public class ContourOverlay extends Overlay {
030
031        static float defaultStrokeWidth = 1.0f; //0.2f;
032        static Color defaultOuterColor = Color.red;
033        static Color defaultInnerColor = Color.green;
034        
035//      static int capsstyle = BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND;
036//      static int joinstyle = BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND;
037//      static float[] outerDashing = {12, 4}; 
038//      static float[] innerDashing = {12, 4}; 
039//      static boolean DRAW_CONTOURS = true;
040        
041        public ContourOverlay(ContourTracer tracer) {
042                this(tracer, defaultStrokeWidth, defaultOuterColor, defaultInnerColor);
043        }
044        
045        public ContourOverlay(ContourTracer tracer, 
046                        double strokeWidth, Color outerColor, Color innerColor) {
047                
048                List<? extends Contour> outerContours = tracer.getOuterContours();
049                List<? extends Contour> innerContours = tracer.getInnerContours();
050                addContours(outerContours, outerColor, strokeWidth);
051                addContours(innerContours, innerColor, strokeWidth);
052        }
053        
054        public void addContours(List<? extends Contour> contours, Color color, double strokeWidth) {
055                BasicStroke stroke = new BasicStroke((float)strokeWidth);
056                for (Contour c : contours) {
057                        Shape s = c.getPolygonPath();
058                        Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(s);
059                        roi.setStrokeColor(color);
060                        roi.setStroke(stroke);
061//                      roi.setStrokeWidth(strokeWidth);
062                        add(roi);
063                }
064        }
065
066}
067
